newsitem.title: USA: Harbourton expects to liquidate by yr end.
newsitem.headline: Harbourton expects to liquidate by yr end.

text.p: Harbourton Financial Services LP said on Thursday that it expects to dispose of its assets by the end of the year.
Net partners' equity at December 31, 1996 of approximately $58.9 million decreased approximately $1.3 million to approximately $57.6 million of net assets in liquidation at March 31, 1997.

This decrease was comprised of an operating loss during the three months ended March 31, 1997 of approximately $2.7 million and net positive adjustments of $1.4 million for the value of certain assets and liabilities, the company said.
